/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, adding a touch of urban life to the otherwise tranquil setting. In the distance, a building with a distinctive red roof stands out, its color contrasting with the surrounding greenery and the blue sky. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a sense of depth and perspective, drawing the viewer's eye down the length of the street. The overall composition of the image suggests a peaceful day in a city where nature and urban life coexist harmoniously.
